sentences.en: But no sensible business leader is starry - eyed about sports.
sentences.cn: 但理智的商业领袖不会过分乐观.

sentences.en: He looked at the starry heavens.
sentences.cn: 他瞧着布满星星的天空.

sentences.en: He raised his head and looked up into the starry sky.
I like the starry winter sky.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这满天星斗的冬夜.
我对欧洲没抱什么幻想。

sentences.en: It was a beautiful sight outlined above the starry sky.
Many and great were his explorations of the starry universe.
sentences.cn: 他对星空的研究硕果累累.

sentences.en: She stared up at the starry sky.
sentences.cn: 她抬头凝视繁星点点的夜空。

sentences.en: Starry , starry night , paint your palette blue and gray.
sentences.cn: 星夜下调色板上只有蓝与灰.

sentences.en: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.cn: 礼物 、 雪花 、 星空 、 月光都给你.

sentences.en: The girl with starry eyes collects a lot of pretty stamps.
sentences.cn: 那个眼睛明亮的女孩收集了很多漂亮的邮票.

sentences.en: The sky was deep blue and starry.
sentences.cn: 天空一片深蓝色，其间星光闪烁。

sentences.en: When they first joined for training many were starry eyed about just sailing around the world. We soon knocked that out of them.
sentences.cn: 在他们参加培训之初，很多人还只是对环球航行抱有天真的想法。我们很快便使他们消除了那种想法。

sentences.en: Where one could look out through the wet window at the starry night.
sentences.cn: 从那里透过水汽蒙蒙的玻璃可以望到外面的星夜.

words.tran_cn: 担任主角的；用星装饰的；用星号标明的；受命运支配的
演员们；明星界；明星身份
小星星；小明星；初涉影坛的演员
